## Neovim keymap (generated by `GenerateKeymapDocs` command)

| mode |     lhs      |                                    rhs                                    |                          desc                          |
|------|--------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| `n`  | `,,`         | ``` :let $curdir=expand('%:p:h')<CR>:vsplit<CR>:ter<CR>cd $curdir<CR> ``` | Open new terminal window to right                      |
| `n`  | `,.`         | ``` : ```                                                                 | Command mode                                           |
| `n`  | `,/`         |                                                                           | FZF commands                                           |
| `n`  | `,0`         | ``` :tablast<CR> ```                                                      | Goto last tab                                          |
| `n`  | `,1`         | ``` 1gt ```                                                               | Goto 1th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,2`         | ``` 2gt ```                                                               | Goto 2th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,3`         | ``` 3gt ```                                                               | Goto 3th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,4`         | ``` 4gt ```                                                               | Goto 4th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,5`         | ``` 5gt ```                                                               | Goto 5th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,6`         | ``` 6gt ```                                                               | Goto 6th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,7`         | ``` 7gt ```                                                               | Goto 7th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,8`         | ``` 8gt ```                                                               | Goto 8th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,9`         | ``` 9gt ```                                                               | Goto 9th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,F`         |                                                                           | FZF lsp_live_workspace_symbols                         |
| `n`  | `,G`         |                                                                           | FZF git_bcommits                                       |
| `n`  | `,H`         | ``` <C-W>H<CR> ```                                                        | Align windows horizontally                             |
| `n`  | `,K`         | ``` <C-W>K<CR> ```                                                        | Align windows vertically                               |
| `n`  | `,T`         |                                                                           | FZF tags                                               |
| `n`  | `,V`         | ``` :SymbolsOutline<CR> ```                                               | Toggle LSP symbols outline tree                        |
| `n`  | `,W`         | ``` :Gw!<CR> ```                                                          | Select the current buffer when resolving git conflicts |
| `n`  | `,a`         |                                                                           | FZF grep_project                                       |
| `n`  | `,b`         |                                                                           | FZF buffers                                            |
| `n`  | `,c`         |                                                                           | FZF clipboard                                          |
| `n`  | `,e`         | ``` :Tex<CR> ```                                                          | Open file browser in new tab                           |
| `n`  | `,f`         |                                                                           | FZF lsp_document_symbols                               |
| `n`  | `,g`         |                                                                           | FZF live_grep                                          |
| `n`  | `,j`         | ``` :bnext<CR> ```                                                        | Switch to next buffer                                  |
| `n`  | `,k`         | ``` :bprev<CR> ```                                                        | Switch to previous buffer                              |
| `n`  | `,l`         |                                                                           | Toggle cursor lock                                     |
| `n`  | `,mT`        | ``` :tabm -1<CR> ```                                                      | Move tab to left                                       |
| `n`  | `,mt`        | ``` :tabm +1<CR> ```                                                      | Move tab to right                                      |
| `n`  | `,o`         |                                                                           | FZF files                                              |
| `n`  | `,p`         |                                                                           | FZF builtin                                            |
| `n`  | `,rn`        |                                                                           | Rename                                                 |
| `n`  | `,s`         | ``` :new<CR> ```                                                          | Open new window to bottom                              |
| `n`  | `,t`         | ``` :tabnew<CR> ```                                                       | Open new tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,u`         | ``` gg=G`` ```                                                            | Indent buffer                                          |
| `n`  | `,v`         | ``` :vnew<CR> ```                                                         | Open new window to right                               |
| `n`  | `<C-H>`      | ``` <C-W>h ```                                                            | Goto to left window                                    |
| `n`  | `<C-J>`      | ``` <C-W>j ```                                                            | Goto bottom window                                     |
| `n`  | `<C-K>`      | ``` <C-W>k ```                                                            | Goto upper window                                      |
| `n`  | `<C-L>`      | ``` <C-W>l ```                                                            | Goto right window                                      |
| `t`  | `<Esc>`      | ``` <C-\><C-N> ```                                                        | Escape from terminal mode                              |
| `n`  | `<Esc><Esc>` | ``` :nohlsearch<CR> ```                                                   | Clear search highlight                                 |
| `n`  | `<M-n>`      |                                                                           | Move to next reference                                 |
| `n`  | `<M-p>`      |                                                                           | Move to previous reference                             |
| `n`  | `K`          |                                                                           | Hover documentation                                    |
| `v`  | `Y`          | ``` "+y<CR> ```                                                           | Big yank (system clipboard)                            |
| `n`  | `gD`         |                                                                           | Show implementations                                   |
| `n`  | `ga`         |                                                                           | Code action                                            |
| `n`  | `gc`         | ``` <Plug>kommentary_motion_default ```                                   | Toggle comment                                         |
| `v`  | `gc`         | ``` <Plug>kommentary_visual_default<C-C> ```                              | Toggle comment                                         |
| `n`  | `gd`         |                                                                           | Goto definition                                        |
| `n`  | `gj`         |                                                                           | Goto next diagnostic                                   |
| `n`  | `gk`         |                                                                           | Goto prev diagnostic                                   |
| `n`  | `gn`         |                                                                           | Goto next reference                                    |
| `n`  | `gp`         |                                                                           | Goto prev reference                                    |
| `n`  | `gr`         |                                                                           | Show references                                        |
| `t`  | `jj`         | ``` <C-\><C-N> ```                                                        | Escape from terminal mode                              |
| `i`  | `jj`         | ``` <Esc> ```                                                             | Escape from insert mode                                |
| `n`  | `qq`         |                                                                           | Kill buffer                                            |
| `n`  | `tt`         | ``` :let $curdir=expand('%:p:h')<CR>:tabnew<CR>:ter<CR>cd $curdir<CR> ``` | Open new terminal tab                                  |
